overview: Two episodes bringing together some of the most famous names in Boca do Lixo's explicit cinema. In "Quanto Mais Pica Melhor", a pervert housewife counts the minutes for her husband to leave for work and then starts to fuck all the employees of the condominium where she lives. In "Who's Got a Thin Thread Doesn't Treat With a Screw", a well-endowed boy from the countryside goes to spend a few days at his godfather's house in the big city and demonstrates his sexual skills to the women of the house.
title: A Grande Trepada
